Summary: Seen close to moon very bright, then quickly disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsFAIRLY LARGE, VERY BRIGHT, OVER HEAD THEN QUICKLY DISAPPEARED VERY BRIGHT, DOES VEHICLE USE LIGHT AS ENERGY SOURCE? VEHICLE WAS VERY WELL DELINEATED 1:returning from supper 2:straight ahead 3:bright star 4:remainedd directly overhead 5:suddenly began becoming smaller (moving away?) and disappeared
